duties_responsibilities.duty: Design consumer and clinical tests to support R&D initiatives
Manage execution of consumer and clinical research activities with internal and external research partners
Develop logistical details for the study execution and flow in collaboration with study team
Manage test samples and documentation for research activities
Oversee all aspects of set up, fielding, and closing out of consumer and clinical research activities
Analyze data from quantitative and qualitative research
Summarize consumer insights into a powerful story through a final report
